seed_pair.target: Podríamos caer si vamos demasiado cerca del borde.
seed_pair.known: We could fall if we go too close to the edge.

S0403: We should remain quiet for as long as possible.
Deberíamos permanecer callados durante tanto tiempo como sea posible.
S0404: We shouldn't expect to finish before Thursday.
No deberíamos esperar terminar antes del jueves.
S0405: Should we ask if we have to book?
S0406: No I'm sure it will be okay.
No, estoy seguro de que estará bien.
S0407: Shouldn't we try to set a good example?
¿No deberíamos intentar establecer un buen ejemplo?
S0408: Yes that's the best way to make a happy family.
Sí esa es la mejor manera de hacer una familia feliz.
S0409: No it doesn't matter what we do.
No no importa lo que hagamos.
S0410: They still fight with each other.
Todavía luchan el uno con el otro.
S0411: Nos gustaría reservar una mesa para cuatro esta noche.
We would like to reserve a table for four tonight.
S0412: We couldn't allow them to win everything.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
